alert.note: Alert for Falls; Hill; Limestone; McLennan; Milam; Robertson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 1:46AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern McLennan, Robertson, northeastern Milam, Limestone, southeastern Hill and Falls Counties through 215 AM CDT... At 145 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Aquilla Lake to near Lake Creek Lake to 6 miles southeast of Cameron. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Waco, Bellmead, Lacy-Lakeview, Marlin, Cameron, Hearne, Groesbeck, West, Mart, Franklin, Hubbard, Rosebud, Calvert, Riesel, Coolidge, Bremond, Hallsburg, Lake Mexia, Twin Oak Reservoir and Fort Parker State Park. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 339 and 354. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Falls; Hill; Limestone; McLennan; Milam; Robertson
